name: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
description: A simple and delicious pasta dish with tomato sauce
instructions: Add pasta to the boiling water
Add tomato sauce, salt, pepper, and olive oil to the pasta

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: A classic and comforting grilled cheese sandwich
instructions: Heat a skillet over medium heat
Butter one side of each slice of bread
Place one slice of bread, butter-side down, on the skillet
Add cheese on top of the bread
Place the other slice of bread, butter-side up, on top of the cheese
Cook until the bottom slice is golden brown
Flip the sandwich and cook until the other side is golden brown

name: Caesar Salad
description: A classic Caesar salad with homemade dressing
instructions: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce
Add croutons and parmesan cheese to the lettuce
Pour Caesar dressing over the salad
Toss the salad until well coated
